backend/main.mo: Defines data models and stores for documents, emotion metrics, gender/location distributions, purchase intention, logs, and exposes CRUD/reset query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Describes feature evidence entries mapping high‑level product requirements to specific frontend source files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short descriptive summaries for multiple frontend source files to support build or documentation workflows.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind and OKLCH color variables plus base and dark‑mode theme styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entrypoint mounting the React application with a root div and main module script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the main app layout and routing using TanStack Router, wrapping pages with theme and toaster providers.
frontend/src/components/BrandEmotionChar: Aggregates brand‑emotion counts from documents and renders a sanitized bar chart with dataset‑aware empty states.
frontend/src/components/CleaningLogPanel: Displays latest cleaning logs with status icons, expandable UI, and loading state using fetched data.
frontend/src/components/ConfusionMatrixC: Renders a validated confusion matrix heatmap with color scaling, emotion translation, and empty-state handling.
frontend/src/components/EmotionChart.tsx: Builds a bar chart of emotion frequencies from analyzed documents with state checks and mock emotion extraction.
frontend/src/components/EmotionDistribut: Generates a pie chart and frequency table of emotion distribution with validation and mock analysis.
frontend/src/components/EnsembleComparis: Visualizes ensemble model metrics in a radar chart with percentage conversion, tooltips, and dataset validation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying a copyright note and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/GenderEmotionCha: Renders a bar chart comparing male and female emotion counts with loading and error states based on gender distribution data.
frontend/src/components/GeoEmotionMap.ts: Processes and filters geographic emotion data for valid Indonesian regions and displays a color‑intensity map with loading and fallback states.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the main app header with navigation, theme toggle, and responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/IntentionBrandCo: Displays a stacked bar chart showing high, medium, and low purchase‑intention levels per brand using fetched intention data.
frontend/src/components/IntentionDemogra: Generates mock gender and location segmentation from intention data and visualizes both in bar charts with fallback when data is missing.
frontend/src/components/IntentionTrendCh: Builds a time‑series line chart showing historical purchase‑intention trends grouped by intention level.
frontend/src/components/MarketingMixRada: Displays an 8-factor Marketing Mix radar chart, computing scores from documents and handling empty or invalid dataset states.
frontend/src/components/MarketingRadarCh: Renders a marketing effectiveness radar chart by computing funnel metrics and showing fallback UI when data is missing.
frontend/src/components/ModelPerformance: Shows bar charts comparing model precision, recall, and F1-score after converting metrics to percentages, with an empty-state view if no dataset is active.
frontend/src/components/PsychoSocialHeat: Generates a psycho‑social heatmap using UTAUT2 constructs and emotion scores, validating matrix dimensions and handling insufficient data.
frontend/src/components/PurchaseIntentio: Displays a pie chart of purchase intention levels from fetched data, with a simple placeholder when no values are available.
frontend/src/components/RecentAnalysis.t: Lists the most recent analyzed documents with mock emotion tags and confidence scores, or shows a placeholder when no documents exist.
frontend/src/components/TemporalEvolutio: Renders a temporal emotion trend line chart by grouping documents into time periods and plotting emotion counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling identity loading, login, logout, and AuthClient configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for CRUD operations and analytics calls on documents using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind styles, color variables, dark mode themes, and print-optimized styling for reports.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMetrics.ts: Computes marketing funnel metric scores from document text and aggregates them across documents.
frontend/src/lib/marketingMixMetrics.ts: Computes deterministic Marketing Mix (8P) factor scores from document text using keyword-based scoring.
frontend/src/lib/mockData.ts: Provides mock brand detection and emotion analysis utilities using simple keyword heuristics and random scoring.
frontend/src/lib/psychoSocialMetrics.ts: Implements deterministic emotion classification and UTAUT2 psycho‑social scoring for heatmap metrics.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReport.ts: Generates strategic reports by analyzing emotions, brand mentions, psycho-social scores, and marketing metrics.
frontend/src/lib/strategicReportLocale.t: Defines bilingual UI labels and content templates for strategic reports in English and Indonesian.
frontend/src/lib/visualizationState.ts: Utility helpers for determining visualization state, sanitizing numeric data, and safe array/matrix access.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, React Query, and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main component.
frontend/src/pages/AnalysisPage.tsx: Provides an emotion analysis interface with document filtering, deletion, charts, and dataset status indicators.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Dashboard for uploading text or files, triggering analysis, and showing overview charts and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/MetricsPage.tsx: Displays model and ensemble performance metrics with confusion matrices, tabs, and dataset change detection.
frontend/src/pages/PurchaseIntentionPage: Shows purchase intention analytics with statistics and charts derived from model output and document data.
frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx: Provides UI controls for configuring model selection, ensemble settings, thresholds, and adaptive features.
frontend/src/pages/StrategicRecommendati: React page that loads documents, generates a localized strategic report, and provides UI for copying, printing, and viewing the report with empty-state handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending theme colors, animations, and containers, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state file describing current features, requirements, architecture notes, and known issues for dashboard visualizations and strategic reporting.
